welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Laval, France! Our charming city is known for its beautiful architecture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Laval has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Cap Horn
restaurants.description: Cap Horn is a café located in Laval.
restaurants.address: 1 Rue de la Paix (Quai Béatrix de Gavre), 53000 Laval

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Entrammes Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Entrammes Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
